title: 求大神帮忙啊，我的世界1.4.7进不去了
author: fac123
txt_content:
一打开就这样了，这些是错误信息：

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Failed to start game

A full error report has been saved to E:\电脑类文档\备份\电脑类文档\yx\我的世界\我的世界坑爹菌1.4.8完美整合包\我的世界坑爹菌1.4.8完美整合包\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-08-23_16.27.40-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.RuntimeException: Unknown character '


他上面显示1.4.8是改过名字，其实是1.4.7的，求大神教教怎么才能进游戏

replies.author: fac123
replies.txt_content:
吾是新手渣渣 发表于 2013-8-23 16:37 
MOD沖突
 那我以前玩的时候都没有什么事，怎么现在就出错了？？

replies.author: fac123
replies.txt_content: 还有，我在一块地图中的地底下，放了好多捆绑式C4，然后一直爆炸，炸卡了，之后我就退了重进就进不去了
